about_the_game:
Thor's Wrath is a solo defense and combat game. You embody a formidable and somewhat brute warrior. Armed with Thor's mighty hammer, you must face hordes of enemies alone while protecting the city's treasures. The goal is to climb to the top of the best warrior rankings and prove yourself worthy of Thor's hammer! The real challenge lies in your ability to wield your hammer or cast spells with precision while safeguarding your treasures.

Thor's Wrath offers immediate entertainment, is a highly accessible game with different levels of complexity and features innovative game mechanics.

Warning :this Game Is Virtual Reality Only

Main Gameplay Elements


Environment & Level : closed environment represented by different places of a huge castle in a dark fantasy world and several levels of difficulties.

Game physics : ragdoll animation providing a lot of fun when you throw the enemies around the environment and destructible scenery.

Weapons: powerful hammer to hit, throw, activate attack spells

Enemies : thieves, Attackers and Defenders with each a different fighting behavior

Score : based on multiple skills (enemies killed, duration of the fight, scenery destroyed, accuracy of throws, …)

Other features


Unique gameplay featuring hammer manipulation like a boomerang.

Competition between players from around the world.

Possibility to improve your skills to create replayability.

Hyper casual game accessible to both casual and hardcore gamers.

Learning through experience : the player increases their score through their skills.
